column4: hey, I want to upgrade from Linux mint 9 to the latest version of Ubuntu.  I have my /home folder in a different partition.  Would it be safe to just unmount my /home, and mount it into 11.10?
any problems I should watch out for?  Or can i just go ahead and install ubuntu over Mint?
i installed ubuntu 11.10 without touching /home -- in the installer, choose 'format /'
